products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-code-engine
products.label: IBM Cloud Code Engine
products.short_description: Provisions and configures IBM Cloud Code Engine
products.long_description: This architecture creates an instance of IBM Cloud Code Engine and configures the project, applications, domain mappings, secrets, configmaps, and service bindings.

features.title: Creates a Code Engine project
features.description: Code Engine projects group, manage, and provide access for Code Engine resources such as applications, jobs, and builds.

features.title: Creates Code Engine applications
features.description: Code Engine applications serve HTTP requests or WebSockets as their communications protocol. The number of running instances of an app are scaled up or down as required by the workdloads.

features.title: Creates custom domain mappings
features.description: Creates the mappings from your custom domain to your Code Engine application in a project to route requests from your custom URL to your application.

features.title: Creates Code Engine secrets
features.description: Provides a method to include sensitive configuration information, such as passwords or SSH keys, to your deployment.

features.title: Creates Code Engine configmaps
features.description: Configmaps provide a method to include non-sensitive data information in your deployment. By referencing values from your configmap as environment variables, you can decouple specific information from your deployment and keep your application portable.

features.title: Creates Code Engine service bindings
features.description: Service bindings provide access from your application to other IBM Cloud services.
